clear.mustBeInChannel:
You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
(or have the `administrator` permission to bypass this.)
clear.alreadyEmpty: The queue seems to already be empty.
clear.cleared: Cleared the queue, removing **{0}** entries, totaling **{1}**.

join.description: Make me join a voice channel.
join.noChannel: You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
join.vcFetchFail: Failed to fetch the voice channel you are in.
join.joinFail: I failed joining the voice channel **{0}**, `{1}`.
join.noJoin: I cannot join the voice channel **{0}**, please fix this issue.
join.noSpeak: I cannot speak in the voice channel **{0}**, please fix this issue.

leave.description: Make me leave a voice channel.
leave.mustBeInChannel:
You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
(or have the `administrator` permission to bypass this.)
leave.notInChannel: I don't seem to be in a voice channel.

play.mustBeInChannel:
You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
(or have the `administrator` permission to bypass this.)
play.noResults: No results were found for the query **{0}**.
play.select: Please provide the number of one of the following to play it.
play.invalid: You provided an invalid input. Make sure you're providing a number, and that number is in the list provided.
play.noTrack: Something went wrong, and no track was selected.

embedSelect.title: Select A Track
embedSelect.description: Select one of the songs below by providing the number, or say `cancel` to cancel.

embedAdded.title: Added To Queue
embedAdded.description:
Added **{0}** by **{1}** to the queue.
Estimated time until playing: **{2}**

queue.description: List all of the songs in the queue.
queue.invalidPage: Invalid page provided. Page number must be between **1** an **{0}**.

remove.description: Remove a specific song from the queue.
remove.mustBeInChannel:
You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
(or have the `administrator` permission to bypass this.)
remove.invalidIndex: Invalid index **{0}** provided, there are only **{1}** songs in the queue.

stop.mustBeInChannel:
You must be in a voice channel to use this command.
(or have the `administrator` permission to bypass this.)
stop.notInChannel: I don't seem to be in a voice channel.
stop.notPlaying: I don't seem to be playing anything.
stop.stopped: Stopped playback and left the voice channel.
